-%0A# ======================%0A#       AGENDA%0A# ======================%0A%0Aclass Agenda:%0A    def __init__(self):%0A        self.contacts: list%5BContact%5D = %5B%5D%0A%0A    def findPosByName(self, name: str) -%3E int:%0A        for i, c in enumerate(self.contacts):%0A            if c.getName() == name:%0A                return i%0A        return -1%0A%0A    def addContact(self, name: str, fones: list%5BFone%5D):%0A        pos = self.findPosByName(name)%0A%0A        # contato existe %E2%86%92 adiciona fones%0A        if pos != -1:%0A            contato = self.contacts%5Bpos%5D%0A            for f in fones:%0A                contato.addFone(f.id, f.number)%0A            return%0A%0A        # criar novo contato%0A        novo = Contact(name)%0A        for f in fones:%0A            novo.addFone(f.id, f.number)%0A%0A        self.contacts.append(novo)%0A        self.contacts.sort(key=lambda c: c.getName())%0A%0A    def getContact(self, name: str):%0A        pos = self.findPosByName(name)%0A        return self.contacts%5Bpos%5D if pos != -1 else None%0A%0A    def rmContact(self, name: str):%0A        pos = self.findPosByName(name)%0A        if pos == -1:%0A            print(%22fail: contato nao existe%22)%0A        else:%0A            self.contacts.pop(pos)%0A%0A    def search(self, pattern: str):%0A        result = %5B%5D%0A        for c in self.contacts:%0A            texto = c.toString()%0A            if pattern in texto:%0A                result.append(c)%0A        return result%0A%0A    def getFavorited(self):%0A        return %5Bc for c in self.contacts if c.isFavorited()%5D%0A%0A    def getContacts(self):%0A        return self.contacts%0A%0A    def toString(self):%0A        return %22%5Cn%22.join(c.toString() for c in self.contacts)%0A%0A%0A# ======================%0A#       MAIN SHELL%0A# ======================
 %0A%0Ade
